chunks.lyrics: Tabbed by: Beau Young - Melbourne, FL
x#letter = repeat notes within brackets a certain number of times fast or slow (f
x# = repeat section a certain number of times
M = full mute (note is played but dies quickly)
m = light mute (muted, but sound takes longer to die)
MMM M M M M M M M x2
MMM M M M M M M M x2
MMM M M M MMM M \
Took me roughly 2 hours to tab. Let me know if its any good or not. You can reach me
e-mail at Limpbizkit118@gmail.com. I mainly play bass and this is my first guitar tab.
